explains: n. 讲道坛；高架操纵台；神职人员

sentences.en: I spoke from the pulpit ad lib.
sentences.cn: 我在讲坛上做了即兴发言。

sentences.en: The time came for the sermon and he ascended the pulpit steps.
sentences.cn: 布道的时间到了，他迈上了讲坛的台阶。

sentences.en: He used the bully pulpit of the presidency very effectively.
sentences.cn: 他非常有效地利用了总统职位这一扩大影响力的工具。
